comment_text: shit, we do most of this process by hand at my plant. O.o
Watching this drinking coffee I just brewed with these filters 😁
Looking everywhere to buy this type of braun coffee filter paper, as large sheets or paper roll (>because I use it as drawing paper). Any idea where to find it?
I could watch it forever! Beautiful!
What is the name of the man who narrates this?

Watching one or two episodes of How It's Made is interesting.  But the management of the Science Channel desperately need counseling.  They run re-run after re-run after re-run after re-run after re-run of How It's Made on the Science Channel all day, all week, all year.  in my 65 years of TV addiction I have never seen anything so nuts.  Looked again at my TV program guide today and it's How It's Made all day into early next morning.  I used to love the Science Channel until this crazy programming.
What an effort for such a small product
